events.name: Global WordPress Translation Day
events.description: Global WordPress Translation Day is 1 full day dedicated to bringing WordPress to more people around the world. 24 hours of live training sessions on WordPress i18n & L10n.http://wptranslationday.org/ More details will be added soon but expect possibly the following  • An appearance by the WordPress Translation Team Lead • Tutorial on how translations work in WordPress • Tutorial on how one helps with translating WordPress, themes and plugins. • Language Experts to help with translation • And possibly stream live to the rest of the world! Location Update: We are having the event at General Assembly's office which is very close to Orchard MRT, it's basically right behind DFS T Galleria.Exit to Shaw from Orchard MRTWalk along the new Michelin 1 Star queue at Pacific Plaza to the back and up a slope to get to 8 Claymore Hill.Use Google Map if you'd not sure! If you're wondering what you can do - don't worry. If you know another language beyond English, you'd be helping make WordPress accessible and useful to the non-English speaking world (which if you don't know, is much bigger than the English speaking population).So come down, contribute to WordPress in your mother tongue or 3rd language. We'll show you how.
events.location: General Assembly Office, 8 Claymore Hill #03-01, Singapore

events.name: KopiJS #31
events.location: A Poke Theory, 27 Boon Tat St, Singapore 069623

events.name: QuantCon Hackathon
events.description: QuantCon Singapore Competition The QuantCon Hackathon is a free, quantitative finance competition that runs from 11AM ~ 6PM in Singapore. Quants, data scientists, students, and anyone else interested in quant finance, are welcome to participate.  Participants will learn, create, and compete with alpha signal factors developed on the Quantopian platform. Winners will be determined using a rigorous, quantitative judging process by team members from Quantopian. Agenda: 11AM - 11:30AM: Intro to Quantopian's Research environment and alpha factor creation library 11:30AM - 11:45AM: Explanation of Hackathon Rules 11:45AM ~ 12:30PM: Hackathon Session 1 12:30PM ~ 1:00PM: Lunch 1:00PM ~ 5:00PM: Hackathon Session 2 5:00PM ~ 5:30PM: Call for Submissions with Quantopian Judge 5:30PM ~ 6:00PM: End of Hackathon and final wrap-up Lunch will be provided by Quantopian for all attendees. If you have any questions, please reach out to Seong Lee at [masked].  QuantCon November 10th-11th Tickets to QuantCon and our workshops are also still available! Please visit http://quantcon.sg/ to learn more.
events.location: 10 Arumugam Road , LTC Building A, 409957, Singapore
